pages.text: Created by breaking the relevant log with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$(), the stripped-away bark contains much wild magic within it.$(br2)Different trees produce different barks, and each of them uch wild magic is stored in the bark of a tree, in addition to its leaves and logs. Breaking a log with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$() allows you to obtain bark.$(br2)$(info) The amount of bark produced can be increased with the fortune enchantment.

pages.name: Birch & Oak Bark
pages.text: Obtained from oak or birch logs.
